title: Lard
steps: Add fatback and water to an oven-safe pan.
Cook in the oven for 2-3 hours, or until the fatback has turned golden brown and rendered fully.
Strain and reserve the fat as needed.
If not using immediately, keep in the fridge for up to 6 months.
notes: Lard is available at most grocery stores, so purchasing is also an option.
Even poor quality lard is sufficient for most purposes since the piggy-flavor is desirable in most ramen applications.
Store in the fridge for up to 6 months.
2 lb of backfat equals approximately 907 grams.
